author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Acacia Research's Board Files Definitive Proxy Materials, Issues Letter To Stockholders
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Acacia Research Corp:
* ACACIA RESEARCH CORPORATION BOARD OF DIRECTORS FILES ITS DEFINITIVE PROXY MATERIALS AND ISSUES LETTER TO STOCKHOLDERS
* ACACIA RESEARCH CORP - RECOMMENDS VOTING ON WHITE PROXY CARD AND FOR ELECTION OF TWO STOCKHOLDERS TO BOARD: LOUIS GRAZIADIO AND FRANK WALSH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
